content: Credit Card AMEX Singapore KrisFlyer Card Miles Asked by Chang Li Ying ClyeeAsked on 24 Jul 2019Should I pay for my Grab rides with GrabPay or AMEX Krisflyer credit card? I would like to earn more miles and am thinking between the 2 payment methods. Which would you advise?2 answersAnswerBump2

Javier Lim, Financial Consultant at Prudential Assurance Company SingaporeLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 28 Jul 2019Definitely with GrabPay; top-up credits using the AMEX Krisflyer card
Why?500 Bonus KrisFlyer miles on Grab; one transaction on GrabPay in Singapore only between 5 May 2016 and 31 December 2019 both dates inclusive.You can Also Earn 3.1 KrisFlyer miles for every S$1 spend on Grab Singapore transactions on the Grab mobile application, up to S$200 each calendar month.Here's The T&C https://icm.aexp-static.com/Internet/IntlHomepage/pdf/KrisFlyerCard.pdfOn top of that you'll earn your GrabReward Points as well0 comments5

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 01 Aug 2019Short answer, Yes.Set your AMEX card up in grabpay so every ride you take or pay a Grab Merchant is via Grabpay. Grabpay then charge your AMEX card. You earn 1.1 base mile and 2 bonus miles for every grab transaction (ride or to a merchant) and you also earn Grab Rewards points every time.0 comments0
